dict.string: Lyo uses your microphone to enable voice interactions with your AI learning companion. This allows for natural conversation and voice-based learning experiences.
Lyo uses your camera to scan learning materials, create visual content, and enhance your interactive learning experience.
Lyo accesses your photo library to save your learning progress screenshots and share your achievements with friends.
Lyo uses speech recognition to understand your voice commands and questions, enabling natural conversation with your AI learning companion.
This allows Lyo to provide you with personalized learning recommendations and measure the effectiveness of our educational content.
